title: Portable Partition Management Software Collection 2016-06-19
description:
Portable Partition Management Software Collection 2016-06-19

About this release

This collection includes the latest versions (whenever possible) of the most efficient commercial solutions to manage disk partitions
All applications are registered and/or patched, you will be able to run them from any location (folder, USB drive)
Most of the applications were virtualized using the latest version of VMWare Thinapp, which ensures they run on any Windows version (up to 10)
These home-brewed VMWare USB versions do not write files nor registry entries to the host computer, they deploy all necessary data to a subfolder along the executable
Some applications are system specific (x86/x64), some will run on both systems
Automatic updates and internet connections were disabled whenever such options are made available in the program's option (disallow internet access if necessary)
All files were scanned with ESET Smart Security (updated 2016-06-19)
Size (unpacked): 0.8 GB

Included in this release

Disk cloning
HDClone 6.0.5 Enterprise Edition + Boot media creator

Disk partitioning / management
Active@ Partition Manager 5.0.15.0
Macrium Reflect 6.1.1311 Technician's USB (Portable only)
Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Premium 10.1.25.813
Paragon Partition Manager 15 Professional 10.1.25.377

Disk defragmentation
Defraggler 2.21.993 Professional
IObit Smart Defrag Pro 5.1.0.788

Disk imaging
Drive SnapShot 1.44.0.17401 (with registration details)
R-Drive Image 6.0 build 6012 Technician Edition
